co2Values.comment:
co2-calculation: Assumption: production and grain yield is similar to that of wheat grain. However, less flour and other products can be produced from spelt as the husk is inedible. 
Assumption: 40% of grain weight is the husk. This is removed and thrown away. Yield compared to white flour is 40% less. 

(0.51 kg CO2/kg white flour (EDB) / 60 ) * 100 = 0.85 kg CO2e/kg dinkel flour

 calculation-process-documentation: The husk of spelt is thick and inedible unlike the husk of wheat. The husk (bran) must be removed in the milling process.
